"Xiemmy": "Xitrae"
"W-Welcome... Thank you very much for coming. Allow me to introduce myself again."
"My name is Xiemmy. I develop new equipment at the Technology R&D department."
"Which leads me to my request..."
"I am currently experimenting with raising the power output of weapons... But I've hit a standstill with the materials I have on hand."
"I've heard about a new ore recently, called Greenillcite..."
"It seems to be some sort of variant of Tetracite."
"Its value as a reagent is... supposedly beyond that of standard ores."
"And so, I would like to run some tests on their Photon output."
"A-And... Well... I thought, perhaps you might be willing to procure some for me...?"
"Oh, nevermind. ...Unless?"
"W-Welcome back... May I... May I have the Greenillcite you've collected?"
"T-Thank you so much."
"They're rather pretty. I can tell they'll work wonders... Hehe, ehehehe..."
"Time for some testing... Here goes."
"Amazing! Stupendous!"
"Take a look! These results truly are incredible!"
"...Ah, forgive me. I didn't mean to get so... excited."
"That's... n-not like me at all..."
"T-The numbers, you see... They improved upon my previous results by over fifty percent... Development should proceed smoothly now."
"But this has awakened a... hunger within me."
"Y-You see, there's this crystalline structure called an Autumn Iris, s-supposedly made from Photons..."
"You can obtain samples from Seasonal Enemies... O-Or so I've heard..."
"I-If you could obtain some for me, I would... It would make me ever so happy."
"May I have them? T-The Autumn Irises."
"Yes... thank you. I really appreciate your help."
"I think... I'd like to run some more tests now. Y-You're absolutely sure? That I can keep these...?"
"Oh... Well..."
"Things... didn't go so well."
"I-I mean, I recorded some incredible numbers, but... They were very unstable."
"The thing is, th-there's actually another crystal, with even higher purity... According to my sources."
"The researchers call it an Autumn Lattice... I-I think..."
"S-So the thing is, they can also be obtained from Seasonal Enemies..."
"But they are much less common. P-Probably..."
"Th-There seem to be other ways, however. To obtain them. I'll send you the details."
"U-Um... If it wouldn't be too much trouble... Would you be willing to get me some...?"
"...A-Are you certain I can have all of these?"
"Amazing... Y-You are amazing, I mean. I can't believe you got all of these for me..."
"I'm getting shivers just thinking about all the data these will produce... Hehe... Hehehehe..."
"I'll begin at once."
"S-Sooo..."
"I... think it went well...?"
"But there are still some... kinks to work out. I'll need to do more testing..."
"There were many... inconsistencies during my experimentation."
"B-But, this is a big step forward."
"Thank you so very much! I am truly, truly indebted to you..."
"...I-If you'd like, I can give you a stabilized version of the weapons..."
"Bring more materials... A-And I'll be happy to exchange them with you."
"W-Well then, I hope we can work together again soon."
"Hello? Helloooo? Is this thing working? You, you're <%me> yeah?"
"Sorry for contacting you out of the blue like this. I'm Xitrae, I work in Supplies."
"I kept hearing about this super strong ARKS, so I wanted to hop on the help train."
"There's some enemies I need you to take out for me, <%me>."
"The ARKS on the frontlines are used to getting requests like this, right? So whaddya say?"
"Just give it a try if you have the time. Thanks in advance!"
"Long time no see, <%me>! It's me, Xitrae."
"Dependable as ever, eh?"
"I've got a request of my own for you, if you're free."
"Think you could go and take down some enemies, just like old times?"
"It's not a direct order or anything, so you can get around to it whenever you're able."
"Welp, seeya!"
"Xitrae? What's wrong?"
"They haven't changed a bit."
"We are always short on materials... For weapon development, that is. If you have any on hand, I... maybe I could offer you something in exchange?"
"Yes? C-Can I help you with anything?"
"Hand over 10 Greenillcite"
"Hand over 10 Autumn Iris"
"Hand over 2 Autumn Lattice"
"Cancel"
"Trade Items"
"O-Oh, you... I'm sorry, but you don't have enough... Really, I'm very sorry..."
"O-Oh... I'll be waiting here, then. Just... waiting here..."
